Robotic Platform - Core Classes Compound List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
  • FunctionalObject (The base class of all functional robotic classes)
  • ObjectManager (Manages all robotic objects created)
  • PhysicalObject (The base class of all physical robotic classes)
  • RoboticObject (The base class of all robotic classes)
  • RoboticPlatform (Overall management of Robotic Platform programs)
  • TypeInfo (Stores run-time type information (base class))
  • TypeInfoAbstractT (Stores run-time type information (template class for abstract classes))
  • TypeInfoT (Stores run-time type information (template class))
